unnormalised: ## New Wheels Alert! What's Launching in the Indian Auto Scene?
normalised: new wheels alert! what is launching in the indian auto scene?

unnormalised: Namaste folks! Your friendly neighborhood petrolhead is back with the lowdown on all the hot new vehicle launches hitting the Indian market. Forget chai, this is the real stuff that gets the blood pumping!
normalised: namaste folks! your friendly neighborhood petrolhead is back with the lowdown on all the hot new vehicle launches hitting the indian market. forget chai, this is the real stuff that gets the blood pumping!

unnormalised: First up, all eyes are on the rumoured launch of the new Maruti Suzuki Jimny 5-door. Finally! The OG off-roader is getting practical. Expected price? Well, buzz on the street is around Rs. 12 lakhs, but we'll see what Maruti pulls out of their hat. Imagine taking this beast up to Ladakh!
normalised: first up, all eyes are on the rumored launch of the new maruti suzuki jimny five-door. finally! the original off-roader is getting practical. expected price? well, buzz on the street is around rupees twelve lakhs, but we will see what maruti pulls out of their hat. imagine taking this beast up to ladakh!

unnormalised: Then there's Tata Motors, always keeping us on our toes. They're teasing a new electric SUV concept, likely to slot above the Nexon EV. Range anxieties, be gone! They’re claiming a range of over 500 km, developed in collaboration with Dr. Kalam Institute of Technology. Fingers crossed it delivers.
normalised: then there is tata motors, always keeping us on our toes. they are teasing a new electric S U V concept, likely to slot above the nexon E V. range anxieties, be gone! they are claiming a range of over five hundred kilometer, developed in collaboration with doctor kalam institute of technology. fingers crossed it delivers.

unnormalised: And let’s not forget Mahindra! Remember all those "Born Electric" concepts they showcased? Expect one of those to finally see the light of day in Q4. Word is, they're planning a swanky launch event in Mumbai, complete with Bollywood celebrities. Because, you know, it's India!
normalised: and let us not forget mahindra! remember all those "born electric" concepts they showcased? expect one of those to finally see the light of day in Q four. word is, they are planning a swanky launch event in mumbai, complete with bollywood celebrities. because, you know, it is india!

unnormalised: The luxury segment isn't sleeping either. Mercedes-Benz is rumoured to be bringing the new GLC to India soon. Think plush interiors, cutting-edge tech, and enough space to rival a small apartment – maybe around 200 sq ft.
normalised: the luxury segment is not sleeping either. mercedes-benz is rumored to be bringing the new G L C to india soon. think plush interiors, cutting-edge tech, and enough space to rival a small apartment – maybe around two hundred square feet.

unnormalised: So, there you have it! A quick peek into the exciting launches coming our way. Get your wallets ready, folks, because 2024 is shaping up to be a year of new wheels! Keep checking back for updates and reviews. Until then, happy driving!
normalised: so, there you have it! a quick peek into the exciting launches coming our way. get your wallets ready, folks, because two thousand and twenty four is shaping up to be a year of new wheels! keep checking back for updates and reviews. until then, happy driving!
